page.title: 14THE VILLAGE BOBBY
page.content: P.C.Campion is the Alfrick Beat Officer. He covers the area of Alfrick,Suckley, Lulsley and Knightwick.He is based at Alfrick Pound. His 8 hour shifts begin at different times each day.Each morning he takes his paper work to Dines Green Station in Worcester,where he receives orders for the day.If there is other work to be done later, he gets additional orders on his personal radio.His call sign is CM 17.He carries this radio on his belt.In his car he has a more powerful radio,which is used to send and receive messages between the car and headquarters in Worcester. When he is off duty a neighbouring beat officer covers his area, should there be any problems or emergencies. When P.C.Campion is on duty he gives similar cover to neighbouring areas.
